item.description:
I reserved the function room at Portugalia Restaurant. The room can hold up to 35 people, which I thought would give the group a change to have a larger event. There will be a buffet for a set price of about $25 per person (includes tax and tip, but not beverages.)

The Menu will include:

Bacalhau (fish) with potatoes and onions

Chicken with Port wine sauce

Pork with clams and potatoes

Rice and vegetables

We'll have dinner and then do some socializing afterwards. We have the whole room, which will make it easier for people to mingle and socialize. For anyone who is familiar with Portuguese food, Portugalia Restaurant specializes in Bakalu (salt cod) and food from northern Portugal.  This is the web site for the restaurant: http://www.portugalia...
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the function room at the restaurant

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at Portugalia Restaurant
